fulltext:
Hanoi, Vietnam, +84 
(+84) 38-990-5280 | kainguyen1509@gmail.com 
https://github.com/haintd 
Hai Nguyen Trong 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
VEGA CORPORATION, Vietnam | July 2017 – August 2018 
Software Engineer 
 
Responsible for designing, planning and implementing the VegaSec project based on the SaltStack open-
source, that enables system administrators to deploy and monitor applications of thousands of servers. 
 
Developed a front-end web used to provide a web user-based interface to the VegaSec services. 
VIETTEL CYBER SECURITY, Vietnam | November 2014 – February 2017 
Software Engineer 
 
Responsible for designing and implementing an IAM (Identity and Access Management) server, which 
supports authentication, authorization, and 2-legged OAuth via REST APIs primarily for use by projects in 
the SIRC (Security Intelligence Response Center) family. 
 
Implemented captcha and TOTP (Time-Based One-Time Password) modules for the Apereo CAS open-
source, which provides enterprise single sign-on service for the web. 
 
Developed front-end web and back-end for the SRM (Security Risk Management) project that used to 
analyze information, assist decision-making, alert vulnerabilities and threats of thousands of servers. 
BKAV CORPORATION, Vietnam | September 2013 – November 2014 
Cloud Engineer 
 
Researched cloud technologies; planned and built private clouds with Openstack. 
 
Developed REST APIs to support web clients communicate with OpenStack services. 
TECHNICAL SKILLS  
 
Algorithms: Good understanding and command of data structures and algorithms. 
 
Languages: Proficient in Python, JavaScript. Familiar with C/C++, Go, HTML, CSS, MySQL, Shell script. 
 
Frameworks/Platforms: Flask, Django, ReactJS/Redux, AngularJS, Webpack, Unix. 
 
Software: OpenStack, Docker, SaltStack, Git, SVN, MySQL, MongoDB. 
 
Others: Good understanding of OOP, design patterns and cryptography; have experience in networking. 
EDUCATION 
HUST – Hanoi University of Science and Technology, Vietnam 
Engineer’s Degree in Software Engineering, July 2013 
 
Degree grade: Good 
NON-WORKING ACTIVITIES 
 
Practice-Python, Practice-JS, Data-Structures-Algorithms: I have created Github repositories to practice 
Python, JavaScript and improve my data structures, algorithms, and problem-solving skills.  
 
I also work on some projects. They can be found at my Github profile https://github.com/haintd. 
Hanoi, Vietnam, +84 
(+84) 38-990-5280 ~  kainguyen1509@gmail.com ~ https://github.com/haintd

experiences.detail:
Responsible for designing, planning and implementing the VegaSec project based on the SaltStack open- source, that enables system administrators to deploy and monitor applications of thousands of servers.
Developed a front-end web used to provide a web user-based interface to the VegaSec services.

Responsible for designing and implementing an IAM (Identity and Access Management) server, which supports authentication, authorization, and 2-legged OAuth via REST APIs primarily for use by projects in the SIRC (Security Intelligence Response Center) family.
Implemented captcha and TOTP (Time-Based One-Time Password) modules for the Apereo CAS open- source, which provides enterprise single sign-on service for the web.
Developed front-end web and back-end for the SRM (Security Risk Management) project that used to analyze information, assist decision-making, alert vulnerabilities and threats of thousands of servers.
Researched cloud technologies; planned and built private clouds with Openstack. Developed REST APIs to support web clients communicate with OpenStack services.
